ERC1155EnumerableInvalidAmount(uint256,u.details: Error raised if the amount of an NFT is not 1

params.amount: The amount of the NFT token
params.tokenId: The ID of the NFT token with an invalid amount

ERC1155InvalidArrayLength(uint256,uint25.details: Indicates an array length mismatch between ids and values in a safeBatchTransferFrom operation. Used in batch transfers.

params.idsLength: Length of the array of token identifiers
params.valuesLength: Length of the array of token amounts

params.defiManager_: The address of the LP-SFT DeFi manager
params.theReserve_: The address of The Reserve smart contract
